title: Green synthesis of thioamide derivatives in an environmentally benign deep eutectic solvent (DES)
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2249-2255
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00206G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Susmita Mandal, Archana Jain, Tarun K. Panda
A wide variety of thioamides are obtained in good-to-excellent yields by the reaction of substituted aldehydes/ketones, secondary amines, and elemental sulfur in a choline chloride–urea (1 : 2)-based deep eutectic solvent (DES).
